welcome.title: Hi, I'm Daffa
welcome.subtitle: Back-End Web Developer
welcome.content: My name is Daffa, I am {age} years old, and I live in Bandung. I am a Web Developer focusing on backend development with Node.js and have intermediate skills in frontend development using Vue.js. I am passionate about expanding my knowledge in the JavaScript ecosystem and other web technologies.

tech.title: Skills and Tools

content1.title: About Me
content1.text: My full name is Muhammad Daffa Fauzan, I was born on December 4, 2005 in Bandung. I am the first child in my family, I also have one brother.
